title: How do dying businesses like Geek Squad stay in business? - Quora

response.answer_text: That begs the question of whether they’re dying or not. If they’re staying in business, how are they dying? Regardless, I would imagine in-home and in-store services play a factor. That, and Geek Squad is a subsidiary of Best Buy. For the record, Best Buy had a net income of $1.46 billion last year. That probably helps.
